  index: 'my_index',
  id: '1',
  refresh: true,
  body: {
    date: '2015-10-01T05:30:00Z'
  }
})
console.log(response0)

  index: 'my_index',
  id: '2',
  refresh: true,
  body: {
    date: '2015-10-01T06:30:00Z'
  }

console.log(response1)

const response2 = await client.search({
  index: 'my_index',
  size: '0',
  body: {
    aggs: {
      by_day: {
        date_histogram: {
          field: 'date',
          calendar_interval: 'day',
          offset: '+6h'
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response2)
